title: Add a delivery address
description: Adds a delivery address to the authenticated user's profile. The phone number, if present, is ignored.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the person whom the item is being delivered to.

fields.name: Address1
fields.description: The first line of the address.

fields.name: Address2
fields.description: The second line of the address (optional).

fields.name: Country
fields.description: The country (currently restricted to "New Zealand" or "Australia").

fields.name: IsMembershipAddress
fields.description: Indicates whether this address is a membership address. This type of address is comprised of address details that are supplied when registering an account. Do not supply this value when adding or updating a delivery address.

fields.name: Id
fields.description: The ID of the delivery address. The membership address always has an ID of zero. This field is ignored when adding a delivery address.

returns.description: <DeliveryAddressResponse> Details on whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
